title: looking for girlfriend - limited time offer
body:
Requirements:

Asian - pref Korean
Pretty feet
Skype for secksi time

Exempt from listed requirements: Renaito Yuujou, CMD Ruby Rose

Limited time because there's only one of me and I'm a loyal man. If you don't come first you may never get a chance again! RIP

Good luck ladies. Add me if interested. Ign: Ånnihilation (copy paste)
